ComicInfo.Characters: Hellboy,Karl Kroenen,Abe Sapien,Liz Sherman,Roger the Honumculus
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T00:03:06 [Issue ID 4000-423652] urn:comicvine:4000-423652 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 20:46:20. [Issue ID 1139354]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Roger gives Karl his "bathing suit" so that he can swim with the other kids.
Hellboy and Liz fill up Johann's suit with chicken soup to help his cold.
Karl sends Herman on a scouting mission.
Johann has a cold and sneezes himself out of his containment suit.
Hellboy and Liz find Roger's metal underwear (but why isn't he wearing it?).
Hellboy shakes up the villains' fort.
ComicInfo.Tags: Hellboy,Abe Sapien,Elizabeth Sherman,Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense,Roger,Grigori Rasputin,The Lobster,Johann Kraus
ComicInfo.Teams: Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense
ComicInfo.Title: A Piece of My Mind or, You Could Use Mine; "So, where are we going to find a new fort?; Gesundheit!; Smashing Walnuts; Enter: Itty Bitty Hellboy
